name: Red Door VR
overview:
Based in Leeds, Red Door VR Ltd supplies panoramic photography and equipment to clients throughout the UK. Formed in 2001 the company has many years experience in the panoramic photography sector.

With a major UK distribution centre and experienced staff, the company delivers a professional service to businesses and individuals. The service is designed to be cost effective, helping clients to produce excellent results.

The business stocks a range of panoramic photo hardware that fit the bill and are ideal for photographers. Supplied by the worlds leading manufacturers, the product range includes Nodal Ninja, Giottos, Panosaurus, Pano Pro, Promote Systems and more.

Red Door also offer a range of hardware solutions for the production of High Dynamic Range (HDR) and Time-lapse photography, and GPS systems to plug directly into your Nikon or Fuji digital SLR to Geotag your images with the location where the shot was taken.

Red Door VR Ltd are proud to be the No. 1 Global Reseller for Nodal Ninja panoramic tripod heads, levellers, photo turntables and accessories for 2009, 2008 and 2007.

With a team of enthusiastic sales people, Red Door VR Ltd has a professional team, qualified to assist you. Red Door VR Ltd has an expanding customer base, based throughout the UK, including a wide range of users from hobbyists to multi-nationals, local authorities and emergency services. The company is managed by a team of like minded individuals who have been involved in the panoramic photography market since 1996. Having previously worked for a range of companies, the team is experienced enough to help with your panoramic photo requirements.
